channel.title: 12media - Music Podcasting
channel.itunes:subtitle: Top artist interviews and the latest music!
channel.itunes:author: 12media
channel.itunes:summary: 12media's free Music podcasts bring you interviews with both well known bands and some of the hottest new artists on the planet! So far the series has included classic rockers Pink Floyd, hotly tipped five piece Captain and multi Grammy nominated artist Kinky. For more information, go to www.12media.co.uk

item.title: Stacie Orrico - Interview
item.itunes:author: 12media
item.itunes:subtitle: Get familiar with talented singer Stacie Orrico!
item.description: In the first of three podcasts, Stacie explains why we haven't heard from her for a while and she talks about the things that inspired her to write the new Beautiful Awakening album - out early 2007.
item.itunes:keywords: stacie orrico, beautiful awekening, I'm not missing you, 12media

item.title: Stacie Orrico - Track by track part 1
item.itunes:author: 12media
item.itunes:subtitle: Track by track interview - "Beautiful Awekening" part 1
item.description: In part one of two track-by-track interviews with Stacie Orrico, the singer talk about the first eight tracks on the Beautiful Awakening album - out early 2007. Stacie openly tells about the ideas and the fun stories behind the tracks, and you can listen to the songs too!
item.itunes:keywords: stacie orrico, beautiful awekening, I'm not missing you, 12media

item.title: Stacie Orrico - Track by track part 2
item.itunes:author: 12media
item.itunes:subtitle: Track by track interview - "Beautiful Awekening" part 2
item.description: In the last track-by-track interview with Stacie Orrico, the singer talk about the final four tracks on the Beautiful Awakening album. Stacie openly tells about the ideas and the fun stories behind the tracks, and you can listen to the songs too!
item.itunes:keywords: stacie orrico, beautiful awekening, I'm not missing you, 12 media

item.title: Captain - "On tour" Podcast #6
item.itunes:author: 12media
item.itunes:subtitle: Captain at the V festival!
item.description: Captain are in Stafford and the band has just played the V festival. Rue chats to Angelina about wax, Rik explains... Mario goes monogamous, Alex does a great job on the bass and Claire chats up Keane. Plus, it's Stevie Grey's birthday!

item.title: Captain - "On tour" Podcast #5
item.itunes:author: 12media
item.itunes:subtitle: Captain on tour in Brighton
item.description: The Captain tour has reached sunny Brighton. The band talks to Angelina about the release of 'This Is Hazelville', Dermot, different sleeping techniques and asks is Mario really from Staines?

item.title: Captain - "On tour" Podcast #4
item.itunes:author: 12media
item.itunes:subtitle: Captain on tour in Leeds
item.description: Angelina catches up with Captain in Leeds and gets the latest gossip. Is there a festival for chavs, a maritime indie magazine and who's a swollen up ugly cow!? Captain's got the answers.

item.title: Captain - "On tour" Podcast #3
item.itunes:author: 12media
item.itunes:subtitle: Captain on tour in Nottingham
item.description: Angelina catches up with the band just before soundcheck at the Social in Nottingham. It's a Jim Beam sponsored night, the Glorious single has just come out and Captain are getting ready to party.

item.title: Captain - "On tour" Podcast #2
item.itunes:author: 12media
item.itunes:subtitle: Captain on tour in Liverpool
item.description: The Captain tour has reached Liverpool and the band is in great form. Find out what happened after Mario slept with the vicar's daughter, why Captain is like a shoe shop and why the song Glorious might be replaced with Paul?

item.title: Captain - "On tour" Podcast #1
item.itunes:author: 12media
item.itunes:subtitle: Captain on tour in Cardiff
item.description: In the first episode of six weekly podcasts - Captain are in Wales, getting ready to play the Cardiff Barfly. Angelina caught up with the band prior to the gig to find out the latest gossip from Rik, Claire, Rue, Mario and Alex, involving spray painted sheep, hair loss, and swimming pools!

item.title: Pink Floyd - "Pulse DVD" part 3
item.itunes:author: 12media
item.itunes:subtitle: Pink Floyd talk about the filmed footage in Pulse.
item.description: In part 3 of the Podcast hear David, Nick and Rick talk about the filmed footage featured in the Pulse DVD; The original film projections on stage, home videos from the tour, bootlegs and audience shots, plus the packaging of the DVD.
item.itunes:keywords: Pink Floyd,Pulse DVD,David Gilmour,Roger Waters,Earl's Court,Pulse part 3

item.title: Pink Floyd - "Pulse DVD" part 2
item.itunes:author: 12media
item.itunes:subtitle: Pink Floyd talk about playing Earls Court.
item.description: In part 2 of the Podcast hear David, Nick and Rick talk about playing Earls Court and the sense of excitement playing such a venue produces, plus the technical issues overcome in getting the concert on 5.1 and onto DVD!
item.itunes:keywords: Pink Floyd,Pulse DVD,David Gilmour,Roger Waters,Earl's Court,Pulse part 2

item.title: Pink Floyd - "Pulse DVD" part 1
item.itunes:author: 12media
item.itunes:subtitle: Pink Floyd talk about the Pulse DVD.
item.description: The Pulse DVD comes out on 11th July 2006 and captures Pink Floyd's live performance at London's Earls Court Arena in 1994. This is the first episode of three by 12 Media, in which you can enjoy some amazing Pink Floyd music and through the band member's own words experience a time of great joy and great togetherness. Pulse is a lasting record of Pink Floyd in their prime.
item.itunes:keywords: Pink Floyd,Pulse,Pulse DVD,Roger Waters,David Gilmour,Pulse part 1

item.title: Kinky - Rarities album
item.itunes:author: 12media
item.itunes:subtitle: Meet multi-Grammy nominated artist Kinky!
item.description: Kinky are releasing their limited edition CD 'Raritites' on 25th July 2006. The album is a must have for all Kinky fans and in this interview podcast with 12 media's own Angelina, Kinky talks about the stunning tracks on the album. Hear for yourself why Kinky are one of the world's finest Latin fusion exports!

item.title: Captain - the band
item.itunes:author: 12media
item.itunes:subtitle: Stay up to day with Captain the band!
item.description: Captain are releasing their debut album 'This is Hazelville' on 14th August 2006. Angelina caught up with the band after their performance at the South By South West festival and found out all about the new single 'Broke', performed live and acoustic exclusively for this podcast!
